Основной задачей в игре является командное противостояние спецназа и террористов. Выбрать команду можно при старте игры. В зависимости от целей, вам нужно будет или уничтожить всех противников другой команды или выполнить задания карты. За задания и убийства врагов, игрок получает деньги. Тратить внутриигровую валюту можно на покупку оружия. 
Внутриигровых заданий много, все зависит от типа выбранной карты. Приведу один из примеров, это "Спасение заложников" - как и понятно из названия, нужно вывести заложников и довести до территории спасения. Если кого-то из них подстрелят - победа за террористами. 
Counter-Strike 1.6 - отличная игра, в которую играть с друзьями еще веселей. Совместной игрой и хорошей атмосферой Counter-Strike 1.6 и привлекает к себе все больше фанатов. Игра популярна также благодаря соревнованиям по киберспорту.

Игра на любителя !
Меня просто испортила CS:GO)

카운터 스트라이크 온라인 생각도 나고 좋았다.
근데 이제 더 이상 서버에 아무도 없는 게임을 왜 다들 추천하고 있는 건지 모르겠다.
2018년에 이 게임은 재밌는 게임도 아니거니와, 멀티 게임인데 전세계 서버에 사람이 단 한 사람도 없다.
왜 다들 이 게임을 추천 하는 건지 모르겠지만, 혹여라도 이 게임을 살까 싶은 사람은 구매하지 말길 바란다.
이 게임을 사도 아무 것도 플레이할 수 없다.
그냥 라이브러리를 채우고 싶을 때나 사는 걸 추천한다.

Probably my first ever FPS game that I've ever played in my entire life. Sitting there infront of an old cube monitor and putting my right leg a bit to the left to avoid from being electrecuted by my own PC case is so nostalgic. Playing this game just reminded me of everything amazing and extraordinary about my old computer.

The original Counter-Strike (CS 1.6) have been known from the many players as one of the all-time classic and one of the most influential FPS game. Might aswell call it the grandfather of the Multiplayer FPS Game besides the other classics such as Quake, Unreal Tournament, Half-Life: Deathmatch, etc. 
  
  Although that the game has a huge skillgap, lack the amount of servers to play, the game is still enjoyable. 
The good thing is the game is not dead, there's still loyal players that is probably 20 years better than you wandering around in their favorite servers. 

  The game has a very rough start if you are a beginner to this game or the whole CS series in general. You have to adapt playing against those who have played the game for years and you will be outmatched alot. You have to be a masochist or have a patience of a saint to get over it. But once you got your hands over the handlebars, it's a fun game. 

I recommend this game for those people who call themselves as a hardcore gamer that likes challenges such as complex shooting mechanics that really requires mastery over aiming and strategic play.

Não tem o que falar sobre cs 1.6 ele e o melhor fps que existe 
joguei praticamente minha infância toda e não troco ele pelo cs:go nunca.

Eu recomendo ele demais se for a 1° veis que você for jogar vai se estranhar com a jogabilidade e um pouco dificil
mas com o tempo você aprende.

O unico problema e que essa versão não possui os bots mais nada que a internet não resolva so precisa baixa-los pelo google muito facil.

E isso cs 1.6 e o melhor jogo de tiro que existe e com mods fica ainda melhor

Really nice game. I am playing this game for quite some time. Yes I know my playtime is still almost 93 hours as of writing this review but I have played this game for more than 1000 hours Non-Steam. It is a fun game requires skill no run and shooting like some other FPS. Community servers are great at least here in India. 
Recommended.

Este quizá fue el juego que nos metió en el mundo de los FPS, y aunque tiene sus años, me alegra ver que el multijugador sigue vivo, si bien no hay mucho que decir, el juego esta excelente (sus servidores son mas confiables que los no-steam, asi que puedes entrar tranquilamente sin riesgo a meterle 300 virus al pc), sin embargo hay dos aspectos que no me agradaron del todo:
- No tiene la clasica musica del menu principal,  se que es un aspecto muy superficial pero a mi parecer hubiera sido perfecto si lo hubieran añadido
- Ausencia de bots, no es posible que las versiones piratas tengan bots y esta, siendo una version de paga, no los tenga

En pocas palabras, la compra sale rentable si esta en oferta (Adquirí el pack completo de counter strike en oferta a $9 dolares, basicamente te estan regalando todos los CS a la mitad del precio del GO), sin embargo yo me la pensaría dos veces antes de comprarlo  de manera individual
Ну блин,ребят,это же старая-добрая КС,о чем тут можно говорить?
